message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its value and quality, it's worth more than $8,000 to you. Considering its market value and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the chance to purchase it for $10,000. This is a special offer tailored to meet your needs and expectations. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your budget and if you're interested in proceeding.
